text: Ruszowice is a village in the administrative district of Gmina Kłodzko, within Kłodzko County, Lower Silesian Voivodeship, in south-western Poland. Prior to 1945 it was in Germany. It lies approximately north-west of Kłodzko and south- west of the regional capital Wrocław. The village has a population of 144. ==References== Category:Villages in Kłodzko County
title: Ruszowice, Kłodzko County
